title: Koukaku Kidoutai Arise: Ghost in the Shell - Border:1 Ghost Pain
synopsis: The anime's story is set in 2027, one year after the end of the fourth non-nuclear war. New Port City is still reeling from the war's aftermath when it suffers a bombing caused by a self-propelled mine. Then, a military member implicated in arms-dealing bribes is gunned down.
